```{r setup}
library(Seurat)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(mclust)
library(knitr)

theme_bw3 <- function () { 
	theme_bw() +
	theme(
		strip.background = element_rect(fill = NA, colour = 'black'),
		panel.border = element_rect(fill = NA, color = "black"),			
		axis.line = element_line(colour = "black", size = 0.5)
	)
}

#https://stackoverflow.com/questions/74522672/kable-highlighting-the-largest-value-in-each-row-r-knitr
print_highlight_table_by_row <- function(csv_file){
  x <- read.csv(csv_file)
  
  max_values <- x |>
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 3)) |>
    select(-X) |>
    purrr::pmap(pmax, na.rm = TRUE) |>
    as.numeric() |>
    na.omit()
  
  tbl <- x |>
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 3)) |>
    mutate(across(-X, ~ if_else(.x == max_values[row_number()],
                                cell_spec(.x,
                                          format = "html",
                                          color = "red", bold = TRUE
                                ), as.character(.x)
    ))) |>
    mutate(across(everything(), ~ ifelse(.x == "NaN", "", .))) |>
    kable(escape = FALSE) |>
    kable_classic(
      full_width = T,
      html_font = "Cambria",
      font_size = 20
    )
  print(tbl)
}

print_highlight_table_by_column <- function(csv_file){
  x <- read.csv(csv_file)

  max_values <- x |> 
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 3)) |> 
    summarise(across(-X, max, na.rm = TRUE)) |> as.vector() |> unname()
  
  tbl <- x |> 
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 3)) |> 
    mutate(across(-X, ~if_else(row_number() %in% which(.x %in% max_values),
                                   cell_spec(.x,format =  "html",
                                             color = "red", bold = TRUE), as.character(.x)))) |> 
    kable(escape = FALSE) |> 
    kable_classic(full_width = T, 
                  html_font = "Cambria", 
                  font_size = 20)
  
  print(tbl)
}

print_table <- function(csv_file){
  x <- read.csv(csv_file)

  tbl <- x %>% 
    kable(escape = FALSE) %>%
    kable_classic(full_width = T, 
                  html_font = "Cambria", 
                  font_size = 20)
  
  print(tbl)
}

getTableColumn<-function(filepath){
  return(paste0("```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}\nprint_highlight_table_by_column('", filepath, "')\n```\n\n"))
}

getTableRow<-function(filepath){
  return(paste0("```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}\nprint_highlight_table_by_row('", filepath, "')\n```\n\n"))
}

getTable<-function(filepath){
  return(paste0("```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}\nprint_table('", filepath, "')\n```\n\n"))
}

getFigure<-function(filepath){
  return(paste0("```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}\ninclude_graphics('", filepath, "')\n```\n\n"))
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
source("/home/shengq2/program/scDemultiplex_analysis/common.r")

names=samples

resFile<-"sub.Rmd"
figureRmd<-function(names){
  result<-""
  name = names[1]
  for(name in names){
    prefix = file.path(root_dir, name, name)
    
    result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n# ", name, "\n\n"))

    result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n## Number of cells\n\n"))

    result<-paste0(result, getTable(paste0(prefix, ".ncell.csv")))

    result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n## Demultiplex result\n\n"))

    result<-paste0(result, getTableRow(paste0(prefix, ".cell.csv")))
    
    result<-paste0(result, getFigure(paste0(prefix, ".demulti1.png")))

    result<-paste0(result, getFigure(paste0(prefix, ".demulti2.png")))

    result<-paste0(result, "\n\n## DE analysis\n\n")
    
    result<-paste0(result, getTableRow(paste0(prefix, ".de.csv")))

    
    if(grepl("batch", name)){
      result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n## AdjustRandIndex\n\n"))
      result<-paste0(result, getTableColumn(paste0(prefix, ".ari.csv")))
      result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n## F score\n\n"))
      result<-paste0(result, getTableColumn(paste0(prefix, ".fscore.csv")))
    }

    if(name == "hto12"){
      result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n## AdjustRandIndex\n\n"))

      result<-paste0(result, getTableColumn(paste0(prefix, ".ari.csv")))

      result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n## In gene expression UMAP\n\n"))
      
      result<-paste0(result, getFigure(paste0(prefix, ".exp_validation.all.png")))

      cts<-c("HEK", "K562", "KG1", "THP1", "Negative", "Multiplet")
      for(ct in cts){
        result<-paste0(result, paste0("\n\n### ", ct, "\n\n"))
        result<-paste0(result, getFigure(paste0(prefix, ".exp_validation.", ct, ".png")))
      }
    }
  }
  return(result)
}
cat(figureRmd(names), file=resFile)
```
